text: The following are the records of Singapore in Olympic weightlifting. Records are maintained in each weight class for the snatch lift, clean and jerk lift, and the total for both lifts by the Singapore Weightlifting Federation (SWF). ==Men== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" !width=9%|Event !width=6%|Record !width=16%|Athlete !width=13%|Date !width=20%|Meet !width=20%|Place !width=3%|Ref |-bgcolor="#DDDDDD" !
